title: Lavish Blue Lobster, Wine Feast For King Charles Cost France Rs 4 Crore
content: An extravagant feast for King Charles has cost the French government a whopping $500,000 million (Rs 4 crore), an audit report has found.
summary: An extravagant feast for King Charles has cost the French government a whopping $500,000 million (Rs 4 crore), an audit report has found.

title: "Ismail Haniyeh's Assassination Will Not Go Unanswered": Hamas
content: A senior Hamas official said Wednesday that the killing of the Palestinian movement's chief Ismail Haniyeh "will not go unanswered".
summary: A senior Hamas official said Wednesday that the killing of the Palestinian movement's chief Ismail Haniyeh "will not go unanswered".

title: How Ismail Haniyeh Rose From Being Activist To Chief Of Hamas
content: Ismail Haniyeh, the Hamas leader who was killed in Iran, was the tough-talking face of the Palestinian group's international diplomacy as war raged back in Gaza, where three of his sons were killed in an Israeli airstrike.
summary: Ismail Haniyeh, the Hamas leader who was killed in Iran, was the tough-talking face of the Palestinian group's international diplomacy as war raged back in Gaza, where three of his sons were killed in an Israeli airstrike.

title: 4 Killed As US Carries Out 'Defensive' Air Strike In Iraq
content: American forces carried out a "defensive" air strike on combatants who were attempting to launch drones that were deemed a threat to US and allied troops, a US official said.
summary: American forces carried out a "defensive" air strike on combatants who were attempting to launch drones that were deemed a threat to US and allied troops, a US official said.

title: Hamas Chief Ismail Haniyeh Killed In Iran's Capital, Group Confirms
content: Hamas chief Ismail Haniyeh and one of his bodyguards were killed in Iran, the Palestinian group said in a statement today.
summary: Hamas chief Ismail Haniyeh and one of his bodyguards were killed in Iran, the Palestinian group said in a statement today.

title: Trump Reveals How Melania Reacted To Rally Shooting: "Means She Loves Me"
content: "She was watching live. It was all over the place, it was on television," Mr Trump said.
summary: "She was watching live. It was all over the place, it was on television," Mr Trump said.

title: Hermes Heir, Who Promised Rs 10,000 Crore To Gardener, Says He Lost Wealth
content: The heir to luxury fashion brand Hermes, who promised to leave half his wealth to his former gardener last year, is now claiming the money has vanished.
summary: The heir to luxury fashion brand Hermes, who promised to leave half his wealth to his former gardener last year, is now claiming the money has vanished.

title: "Say It To My Face": Kamala Harris Challenges Donald Trump For Debate
content: US Vice President and Democratic Party's presumptive presidential candidate Kamala Harris has challenged her Republican rival, former president Donald Trump, for a debate, provoking him to say whatever he has to say to her face.
summary: US Vice President and Democratic Party's presumptive presidential candidate Kamala Harris has challenged her Republican rival, former president Donald Trump, for a debate, provoking him to say whatever he has to say to her face.

title: Harris' "Say It To My Face" Dare To Trump After He Calls Her "Crazy"
content: US presidential hopeful Kamala Harris launched a searing attack on Donald Trump Tuesday, telling her biggest campaign rally yet that the momentum was shifting in the White House race and daring the Republican to debate her face to face.
summary: US presidential hopeful Kamala Harris launched a searing attack on Donald Trump Tuesday, telling her biggest campaign rally yet that the momentum was shifting in the White House race and daring the Republican to debate her face to face.

title: What Expert Who Predicted 9 US Polls Correctly Said On Trump vs Harris

title: Mexico Drug Lord El Chapo's Son Pleads Not Guilty To Drugs Charges
content: The son of the former Sinaloa drug cartel leader Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman pleaded not guilty Tuesday to a raft of charges linked to one of the world's biggest illicit narcotics operations, prosecutors said.
summary: The son of the former Sinaloa drug cartel leader Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman pleaded not guilty Tuesday to a raft of charges linked to one of the world's biggest illicit narcotics operations, prosecutors said.

title: Jailed Ex-Pak PM Imran Khan Says His Party Ready To Talk With Military
content: Former Pakistan Prime Minister Imran Khan, said that his party is ready to hold talks with the military, a remark that drew a lot of flak from the Shehbaz Sharif-led government, Geo News repo
summary: Former Pakistan Prime Minister Imran Khan, said that his party is ready to hold talks with the military, a remark that drew a lot of flak from the Shehbaz Sharif-led government, Geo News repo

title: Violent Crowd Clashes With UK Police After Young Girls Killed
content: A large crowd of anti-Muslim protesters clashed with police on Tuesday in a northern English town where three girls were stabbed to death and five other children critically wounded during an attack on a Taylor Swift-themed event on Monday.
summary: A large crowd of anti-Muslim protesters clashed with police on Tuesday in a northern English town where three girls were stabbed to death and five other children critically wounded during an attack on a Taylor Swift-themed event on Monday.

title: US Carries Out Strike In Iraq Amid Middle East Tensions
content: The United States on Tuesday carried out a strike in Iraq in self defence, a U.S. official told Reuters, as regional tensions rose after an Israeli airstrike in Beirut that Israel said killed Hezbollah's most senior commander.
summary: The United States on Tuesday carried out a strike in Iraq in self defence, a U.S. official told Reuters, as regional tensions rose after an Israeli airstrike in Beirut that Israel said killed Hezbollah's most senior commander.

title: Israel Says It Killed Top Hezbollah Commander Fuad Shukr In Beirut Strike
content: The Israeli military said its fighter jets "eliminated" Hezbollah military commander Fuad Shukr in the area of Beirut on Tuesday, accusing him of being responsible for a rocket strike on the annexed Golan Heights.
summary: The Israeli military said its fighter jets "eliminated" Hezbollah military commander Fuad Shukr in the area of Beirut on Tuesday, accusing him of being responsible for a rocket strike on the annexed Golan Heights.

title: Kamala Harris Gaining Ground On Trump In 6 Of 7 Swing States: Report
content: Democratic U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris has gained ground against Republican Donald Trump in six of the seven swing states since President Joe Biden dropped out of the presidential race, according to a Bloomberg News/Morning Consult poll.
summary: Democratic U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris has gained ground against Republican Donald Trump in six of the seven swing states since President Joe Biden dropped out of the presidential race, according to a Bloomberg News/Morning Consult poll.

title: Kamala Harris Expected To Announce Her Running Mate As Early As Monday
content: Kamala Harris will announce her vice presidential pick as early as Monday before embarking on a multi-state battleground tour with her new running mate later in the week, two sources familiar with the planning said on Tuesday.
summary: Kamala Harris will announce her vice presidential pick as early as Monday before embarking on a multi-state battleground tour with her new running mate later in the week, two sources familiar with the planning said on Tuesday.
